Mangroves Pilot Fellowship 2022-23 Materials

Texts:

Bregman, Rutger. “The Solution to (Nearly) Everything: Working Less.” The Guardian, 2021, www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2016/apr/18/solution-everything-working-less-work-pressure

Chakrabarti, Vishaan. “Building Hyperdensity and Civic Delight.” Places - a Forum of Environmental Design, no. 2013, June 2013, doi:10.22269/130613

Da Cunha, Dilip. “Introduction” The Invention of Rivers: Alexander’s Eye and Ganga’s Descent. Penn Studies in Landscape Arch, 2018

Desmond, Matthew. “The Eviction Epidemic.” The New Yorker, 1 Feb. 2016, www.newyorker.com/magazine/2016/02/08/forced-out

Dougherty, Conor. “California’s Housing Crisis: How a Bureaucrat Pushed to Build.” The New York Times, 16 Sept. 2021, www.nytimes.com/2020/02/13/business/economy/housing-crisis-conor-dougherty-golden-gates.html

Georgescu-Roegen, Nicholas. “The Steady State and Ecological Salvation: A Thermodynamic Analysis.” BioScience, vol. 27, no. 4, 1977, pp. 266–70. JSTOR, https://doi.org/10.2307/1297702

Giesen, James C. "The View from Rose Hill: Environmental, Architectural, and Cultural Recovery on a Piedmont Landscape." Buildings & Landscapes: Journal of the Vernacular Architecture Forum, vol. 27 no. 2, 2020, p. 19-38. Project MUSE, doi:10.5749/buildland.27.2.0019

Heidegger, Martin. Building Dwelling Thinking. Translated by Adam Bobeck, 2021, www.academia.edu/34279818/Building_Dwelling_Thinking_by_Martin_Heidegger_Translation_and_Commentary_by_Adam_Bobeck_

Humboldt, Alexander. “Introduction.” Cosmos: A Sketch of a Physical Description of the Universe, Translated From the German, by E.C. Otté. Harper and Brothers, 1860, babel.hathitrust.org/cgi/pt?id=hvd.32044024599714&seq=1

Illich, Ivan. “Tools for Conviviality.” Internet Archive, 1973, pp. 3-7, 101-117, archive.org/details/illich-conviviality/page/6/mode/2up

Kahn, Susan. “Nagarjuna’s Seventy Verses on Emptiness.” Emptiness Teachings, translated by Christian Lindtner, June 2022, emptinessteachings.com/2011/03/01/159

Keynes, John Maynard. “Economic Possibilities for Our Grandchildren.” 1930. Essays in Persuasion, W.W. Norton and Co, 1963

Kimmerer, Robin Wall. “Skywoman Falling.” Braiding Sweetgrass: Indigenous Wisdom, Scientific Knowledge and the Teachings of Plants. Penguin UK, 2020

Kimmerer, Robin Wall.“Learning the Grammar of Animacy.” Braiding Sweetgrass: Indigenous Wisdom, Scientific Knowledge and the Teachings of Plants. Penguin UK, 2020

Kimmerer, Robin Wall.“Shkitagen: People of the Seventh Fire.” Braiding Sweetgrass: Indigenous Wisdom, Scientific Knowledge and the Teachings of Plants. Penguin UK, 2020

Kropotkin, Petr. “Introduction.” Mutual Aid: A Factor of Evolution, 1902, theanarchistlibrary.org/library/petr-kropotkin-mutual-aid-a-factor-of-evolution

Kropotkin, Petr. “Chapter 9: Conclusion” Mutual Aid: A Factor of Evolution, 1902, theanarchistlibrary.org/library/petr-kropotkin-mutual-aid-a-factor-of-evolution

Latouche, Serge. “Degrowth Economics.” Le Monde Diplomatique, 14 Nov. 2004, mondediplo.com/2004/11/14latouche

Lawrence, Bruce B. “‘ALL DISTINCTIONS ARE POLITICAL, ARTIFICIAL’: The Fuzzy Logic of M. F. Husain.” Common Knowledge, vol. 19, no. 2, Duke UP, Apr. 2013, pp. 269–74, doi:10.1215/0961754x-2073251

Liu, An. “The Essential Huainanzi : Liu an : Free Download, Borrow, and Streaming : Internet Archive.” Internet Archive, 15 Feb. 2020, archive.org/details/theessentialhuainanziliuan/page/n117/mode/2up. pp. 118-126

Marx, Karl. “Estranged Labour.” Economic and Philosophical Manuscripts of 1844, www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/1844/manuscripts/labour.htm

Oladosu, Adenike. “Climate, Poverty, Democracy: What Is at Stake in Nigeria’s 2023 Election?” Wilson Center, 2023, www.wilsoncenter.org/blog-post/climate-poverty-democracy-what-is-at-stake-in-nigerias-2023-election

Richter, Daniel. “Game Changer in Soil Science. The Anthropocene in Soil Science and Pedology.” Journal of Plant Nutrition and Soil Science, vol. 183, no. 1, Wiley, Sept. 2019, pp. 5–11, doi:10.1002/jpln.201900320

Richter, Daniel, and Sharon A. Billings. “‘One Physical System’: Tansley’s Ecosystem as Earth’s Critical Zone.” New Phytologist, vol. 206, no. 3, Wiley-Blackwell, Mar. 2015, pp. 900–12, doi:10.1111/nph.13338

Richter, Daniel, and Sharon Billings. “Ansichten Der Calzone: Views From the Calhoun Critical Zone Observatory.” Critical Zones, edited by Bruno Latour and Peter Weibel, 2020, dukespace.lib.duke.edu/dspace/handle/10161/21401

Smil, Vaclav. “Preface.” Growth: from Microorganisms to Megacities. The MIT Press, 2019, pp. Vii-xxv

Sulayman, Uludag. “Muqaddimah”. 2008. Khaldun, Ibn. 1377. Excerpts: 158-61, 164, 189, 199, 204-09, 213-16, 323-26, 333-35, 338-39, 349-51, 373-76, 388-94, 399-01, 417-21, 507-09, 549-51, 571-73, 629-31, 693-96, 765-70

Weismantel, Mary J. “Moche Sex Pots: Reproduction and Temporality in Ancient South America.” American Anthropologist, vol. 106, no. 3, American Anthropological Association, Sept. 2004, pp. 495–505, doi:10.1525/aa.2004.106.3.495

Williams, Raymond. “Ideas of Nature.” Problems in Materialism and Culture. Verso, 1980 pp. 67- 85


AudioVisual Materials:

Baruch Spinoza. “Hildegard Von Bingen - Columba Aspexit.” YouTube, 6 Dec. 2014, www.youtube.com/watch?v=BpmMeIQywYc.

Emmet, Jeff. “Mycopunk Futures: Mycelial Cyborg Economies.” Team Human, 15 Feb 2023 https://www.teamhuman.fm/episodes/238-jeff-emmett.

“Hildegard of Bingen - 18 Artworks - Illustration.” www.wikiart.org, www.wikiart.org/en/hildegard-of-bingen.

Mark Ye. “Multi Screen Projection - Animated Version of the Riverside Scene at Qingming Festival.” YouTube, 26 Aug. 2021, www.youtube.com/watch?v=wqNQH8OfIXc.

Michael S Glennon. “O Jerusalem Aurea Civitatis, Sequence to St Rupert.” YouTube, 3 July 2017, www.youtube.com/watch?v=lGONgSKMzSA.

“Scivias Summary and Images.” Healthy Hildegard, Apr. 2020, www.healthyhildegard.com/scivias-illustrations.

Songs from “V. Hildegard’s Symphonia Armonie Celestium Revelationum (‘Symphony of the Harmony of Heavenly Revelations’).” Hildegard Society, www.hildegard-society.org/p/music.html pp. 4, 11, 15, 17-18, 26.

TED. “Vishaan Chakrabarti: A Vision of Sustainable Housing for All of Humanity | TED Countdown.” YouTube, 20 Feb. 2022, www.youtube.com/watch?v=B8kyrIQCFXQ.

Zeduan, Zhang. Along the River During the Qingming Festival. 1085-1145, Palace Museum, Bejing


Fellow/Mangroves Materials:

Escobar, Arturo et. al, “Relationality, Remaking and Restor(y)ing life.” 2022. [forthcoming]

Liu, David. “an Exegetico-poetic Translation of the Textus Receptus.” Laozi: “Dao De Jing.” [unpublished]

Liu, David. “A Translation from the Masoretic Text.” Ecclesiastes. [unpublished]

Liu, David and Rankin, Tom. “Preamble to Mobility Project.” 2023. [unpublished]

Menghi, Adriana for Mangroves, “Rome: the First Car Free Metropolis.” 2022. [unpublished]

Tamburrino, Antonio and Rankin, Thomas. “Rome Strategic Plan for Urban Mobility.” 2023.

Tyalampi, Zolani Prince Shapiro “Growth, Birthright to all Things in Existence” and “Mama Africa” [unpublished]
